title: Pauline Ferrand Prevot Blazes to Olympic XC Gold, USA’s Haley Batten Silver
content:
Pauline Ferrand Prevot rode with grace under pressure to finally win an elusive gold medal in her fourth Olympic Games.

Read the full article at Pauline Ferrand Prevot Blazes to Olympic XC Gold, USA’s Haley Batten Silver on Velo.
author: ahood
